subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Missing the sport after her own career came to an abrupt end because of injury, Anastasia Myskina, a self-proclaimed “team person,” leads the Russian team into the final against the Czech Republic.
snippet: Missing the sport after her own career came to an abrupt end because of injury, Anastasia Myskina, a self-proclaimed “team person,” leads the Russian team into the final against the Czech Republic.
